thread.title: Man-Cave | Watch: Here's Shane Byrne asking for a pint on live television
thread.title_full: Man-Cave | Watch: Here's Shane Byrne asking for a pint on live television - entertainment.ie

author: Brian Lloyd
title: Man-Cave | Watch: Here's Shane Byrne asking for a pint on live television
text:
Bless him, 'oul Shane Byrne, he's doing his best at the 'oul punditry.
Remembering when the mic is on and when he's being called upon for a live question, however, is part of the game.
And sure enough, when he was asked if a Martian (seriously?) would ask how South Africans play rugby, Shane quipped that he'd never met a Martian and if said Martian was an attractive one. As you do.
He then followed it up with a classic Dad Joke; "The point is, I'd love a pint." And then, it hits him. Oof.
Let's see it again, Jeff.
So, we're guessing Shane Byrne's off down to Kielys once all this is over, yeah?
Shocking carry on altogether.
MORE: Watch: The two best Irish reactions to Japan's win over South Africa yesterday
MORE: Here's how Twitter reacted to England leaving the Rugby World Cup
MORE: Watch: Sminky Shorts is back with an episode about tomorrow's rugby game against France
